name.baseName: Material Drying ; Ceramic floor tile (once fired - decorative glaze) ; Feldspar, quartz, porcelain clay, etc. ; Drying tower (natural gas) ; All sizes; NESPS2
物料干燥 ; 陶瓷地砖（一次烧成-饰釉） ; 长石、石英、瓷土等 ; 干燥塔（天然气） ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isOthers (wet electrostatic precipitation)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isOthers (wet electrostatic precipitation)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程生产的陶瓷地砖（经过一次烧成和饰釉处理），使用天然气干燥塔对长石、石英和瓷土等物料进行干燥，适用于需要装饰性釉面瓷砖的各种室内空间。该过程适用于不同规模的生产。尾气处理技术被用来控制颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）、二氧化硫和氮氧化物的污染，采用了不同的技术效率和方法，如布袋过滤器、旋风除尘、纳米碱法、石灰/石膏法、SNCR和湿式静电除尘。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码30,三级代码307.0,四级代码3071文件，在完整版文件中第812页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为陶瓷地砖（一次烧成-饰釉），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isOthers (cyclone + bag filter + spray)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.8，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是其他（旋风+布袋+喷淋），其效率为99.8，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时/年)/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isCyclone dust removal + bag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.5
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是旋风+布袋，其效率为99.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时/年)/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时/年)/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisOthers (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是其他（钠碱法），其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时/年)/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisLime/gypsum method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是石灰/石膏法，其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时/年)/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisSNCR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是选择性非催化还原法（SNCR），其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时/年)/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是直排。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered
污染物指标废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是直排。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isOthers (wet electrostatic precipitation)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是其他（湿式电除尘），其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时/年)/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
